what: Energy and emissions data for world countries. — energy_and_emissions
title: Energy and emissions data for world countries. — energy_and_emissions
text: dataset containing information 188 world countries, including population estimates, GDP per capita, energy consumption estimates, CO_2 emissions.

title: Energy and emissions data for world countries. — energy_and_emissions
Energy and emissions data for world countries. — energy_and_emissions
text: data frame 188 rows 11 variables: Country Names countries factor Area Surface land area country sq.km Population Population estimates PYear Year population estimate GDPPC Nominal GDP per capita US dollars bblpd Estimated energy consumption barrels oil per day EYear Year energy consumption estimate CO2_1995 CO_2 emissions kilotonnes per year - 1995 estimates CO2_2005 CO_2 emissions kilotonnes per year - 2005 estimates CO2_2015 CO_2 emissions kilotonnes per year - 2015 estimates Continent Names continents factor

title: Energy and emissions data for world countries. — energy_and_emissions
text: Energy Consumption Data Source: CIA Factbook, Refined Oil Products Consumption (https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/-world-factbook/rankorder/2246rank.html) Accessed: September 5, 2017 CO2 Emissions Data Source: EC Emissions Database Global Atmospheric Research (http://edgar.jrc.ec.europa.eu/overview.php?v=CO2ts1990-2015) Accessed: September 5, 2017 GDP Data Source: Wikipedia (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_countries_by_GDP_(nominal)_per_capita) Accessed: September 5, 2017 Continent names extracted package countrycode (https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=countrycode)
